description:
Manual games allow you to set custom check locations and custom item names that will be rolled into a multiworld.
This allows any variety of game -- PC, console, board games, Microsoft Word memes... really anything -- to be part of a multiworld randomizer.
The key component to including these games is some level of manual restriction. Since the items are not actually withheld from the player,
the player must manually refrain from using these gathered items until the tracker shows that they have been acquired or sent.

Beta_1.0.0.description:
Initial Version in Beta

- Added 2 options to delete either of the games from the yaml for a shorter overall experience. This also eliminates the mods that are for the other game as well
- Added 2 new goals, both of which can only be done if one game is removed (Victory at Hoover Dam (New Vegas) and Enclave Mobile Base Destroyed)
- Added the missing quest "Find Collar 8: "Dog"" to the apworld with proper categorization
- Added 2 new option categories for Fallout 3 and Fallout New Vegas in conjunction with the new options
- Renamed the original Victory at Hoover Dam victory condition to "Victory at Hoover Dam (Tale of Two Wastelands)" to better fit with the new victory conditions
Beta_1.0.0.title: Beta 1.0.0

Beta_1.5.0.description:
Beta 1.5.0 - The Rebuild the Capital Update

- Added the remaining named operations and the side quests from the Rebuild the Capital mod
- Redid the logic of existing locations from the mod
- Renamed some locations from the original release
- Added new items and logic requirements for both old and new locations
Beta_1.5.0.title: Beta 1.5.0 - The Rebuild the Capital Update

Beta_2.0.0.description:
# Beta 2.0.0 - The Tale of Two Wastelands Category Update

- Removed a couple duplicate locations that snuck their way in
- Added a new category for the Union Station TTW quest and Rebuild the Capital mod that they share (Tale of Two Wastelands)
- Added a new option to disable them if you are only using one of the games, as none of the things mentioned above actually matter for a 1-game async player or playthrough.
This is probably going to be the last release for this unless manual gets updates or new quests/collectables get added to existing mods
Beta_2.0.0.title: Beta 2.0.0 - The Tale of Two Wastelands Category Update

Beta_2.5.0.description:
- Removed three locations from Washington's Malevolence due to being scrapped quests
- Added the Autumn Leaves and Race to the Bottom mods to the list of checks
- Re-added the FNV version of 3DNPC back for main list reasons
- Added new items to reflect the new locations and regions that were added with the update
Beta_2.5.0.title: Beta 2.5.0 - The Additional Quests update
